<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Populate default ISC Event Ribbon preferences for all
			users upgrading to New York</description>
        <name>Populate default ISC Event Ribbon prefs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.dropColumn('appsec_isc_event_configuration', 'report');
	
var empty_gr = new GlideRecordSecure('appsec_isc_event_configuration');
empty_gr.deleteMultiple();

var user_gr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_user');
user_gr.addEncodedQuery('roles=admin^ORroles=security_dashboard_user');
user_gr.query();

while(user_gr.next()){
	var trend_gr = new GlideRecordSecure('pa_widgets');
	trend_gr.addQuery('tag','183ed3c8b313230026b4e12b86a8dc07');
	trend_gr.query();

	var count = 0;
	while(trend_gr.next()){

		// Add records to event configuration table
		var trend_user = new GlideRecordSecure('appsec_isc_event_configuration');
		trend_user.addQuery('trend', trend_gr.sys_id);
		trend_user.addQuery('user', trend_gr.sys_id);
		trend_user.query();
		if (!trend_user.next()) {
			trend_user.initialize(); 
			trend_user.trend = trend_gr.sys_id;
			trend_user.user = user_gr.sys_id;
			trend_user.show = "True";
			trend_user.priority = count + 1;
			trend_user.insert(); 
		}
		count +=1;
	}
}]]></script>
